title: Electrochemically-driven actuators: from materials to mechanisms and from performance to applications
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, 53,5956-6010
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00906H, Review Article
Lixue Yang, Yiyao Zhang, Wenting Cai, Junlong Tan, Heather Hansen, Hongzhi Wang, Yan Chen, Meifang Zhu, Jiuke Mu
This review aims to capture the current state of electrochemical actuators and set a trajectory for future innovation in this field.
